snippet: Madonna kept her lips sealed on what songs she would be playing during Sunday's halftime show, but did plenty of bantering with the media Thursday.
abstract: Madonna kept her lips sealed on what songs she would be playing during Sunday's halftime show, but did plenty of bantering with the media Thursday.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS--There was little to be learned at Madonna's news conference Thursday other than the fact that the pop star does not regularly watch football, is recovering from a strained hamstring and is a fan of Victor Cruz's salsa dancing.

headline.main: Madonna Talks Victor Cruz, High-Ankle Sprains
